page.title: 10Housing in Talke
page.content: In Talke there are lots of different kinds of housing.There are still some very old houses left,they are mostly terraced with no front gardens and narrow entries leading to the back of the houses.Many old houses have been knocked down leaving large open spaces for playing on.There are estates of council houses,most are semi-detatched, although some are in blocks of four.They were built soon after the 1939/45 war,and all have gardens.They were all rented from the council but now some people have bought their own.There are small estates of private houses which have been built during the last twenty years to fill the spaces between existing areas of housing.There are a few blocks of rented flats,but these are only two or three stories high.There are no tall buildings in Talke.
